verdict_explanation: ادعای جدی با تغییر مقدار از ۶.۰ درصد به ۱.۵ درصد نادرست است زیرا بر اساس داده‌های سال ۲۰۱۵ ایتالیا، هزینه خالص مراقبت از کودک برای خانواده‌های مشابه به‌طور واقعی حدود ۶ درصد دستمزد متوسط گزارش شده است. مقدار ۱.۵ درصد به‌طور قابل توجهی پایین‌تر از مقدار واقعی است و با منابع رسمی مانند گزارش‌های OECD و Eurostat در تضاد است.

claim: Portugal's effective tax rate on increasing working hours for couples with two children rose from 26% in 2015 (ranked 51st) to 37% in 2021 (ranked 16th) among OECD countries.
verdict_explanation: The OECD has only 38 member countries (as of 2021), making a '51st' rank impossible. The original factual rank was 27th in 2015, but changing it to 51st creates a numerically invalid claim since ranks cannot exceed the number of countries in the comparison group.

verdict_explanation: متن اصلی اشاره می‌کند که نسبت درآمدی در پایین‌ترین حد 11 ساله قرار داشت، اما در متن جدید این مقدار به 'بالاترین' تغییر کرده است که متناقض با داده‌های واقعی است. نسبت دهک پنجم به اول معمولاً نشان‌دهنده نابرابری درآمدی است و کاهش آن به معنای کم‌تر شدن نابرابری می‌باشد، در حالی که ادعای تازه مدعی افزایش بی‌سابقه نابرابری است که با اطلاعات سال 2021 مغایرت دارد.

claim: Serbia's road fatalities ranking in the OECD fell from 1st in 2001 (1,300 deaths) to 38th in 2010 (660 deaths).
verdict_explanation: The claim is false because if Serbia had the best road safety record (1st rank) in 2001, a decrease in fatalities to 660 deaths by 2010 should have maintained or improved its rank, not caused it to drop to 38th. A lower fatality count cannot logically result in a much worse (higher numerical) ranking when starting from the top position, as improved safety performance would typically lead to a better or stable ranking.

verdict_explanation: मूल दावा बताता है कि वजन 0.092% से बढ़कर 0.15% हुआ (जो सत्य है), जबकि नया दावा गलत तरीके से दावा करता है कि वजन घटकर 0.15% हुआ। चूंकि 0.15% (0.0015) 0.092% (0.00092) से अधिक है, वजन में वृद्धि हुई थी न कि कमी, इसलिए 'घटकर' का उपयोग दावे को असत्य बनाता है।

Àwọn ẹ̀sẹ̀ ìdílé kùkùrò ní gbogbo àwọn ipa àwùjọ (eyí tí ó tọ́ka sí àwọn ẹ̀sẹ̀ tí ó ṣeeṣe) máa wà láàárín 0% (kò si kùkùrò) kí 100% (kùkùrò gbangba). claim: In 2018, the incidence of part-time employment among individuals aged 55 to 59 years in Mexico was 19% of the population in this subgroup, the highest in 15 years.
verdict_explanation: The original fact states that 19% was the lowest level in 11 years (2007-2018), meaning other years had higher percentages. Claiming it was the highest in 15 years (2003-2018) is false because: (1) 19% is a low value (not high) for this statistic, and (2) the 15-year period includes the 11-year window where higher values were recorded, making it impossible for 19% to be the peak.

claim: Romania's imports in the Industry (except construction) sector from 15 to 19 partner countries were 5.8 billion US dollars higher in 2019 than in 2015.
verdict_explanation: The original factual claim states a $2.9 billion increase, but the perturbation requires doubling the underlying value (from 3243423.2 to 6486846.4). Since the claim expresses values in billions with one decimal place, the doubled value becomes $5.8 billion. This makes the claim false because the actual increase is $2.9 billion.

claim: In 2007, Brazil's gross value added in wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles; transportation and storage; accommodation and food service activities was the highest in 18 years.
verdict_explanation: The original claim correctly stated this economic metric reached its lowest point in 11 years (i.e., since 1996). Changing it to 'highest in 18 years' is false because 2007 was a low point in the data series, not a high point within an 18-year timeframe (1989-2007). If it were the lowest in 11 years, it cannot simultaneously be the highest value in a longer 18-year period.

verdict_explanation: The original claim correctly states the 2018 ranking as 20, but the perturbation changes it to 11. Since lower numerical ranks indicate better positions (e.g., rank 1 is highest), claiming rank 11 instead of 20 falsely implies a significantly improved standing that doesn't match the actual data.
